nodes.text: Galactic Alliance Space was the territory of the Galactic Alliance following the Fel Empire's victory at the Battle of Caamas during the Sith–Imperial War. Emperor Roan Fel granted the Triumvirate viceroyship over the region. When Darth Krayt became Emperor of his own Sith Empire, the Triumvirate's authority was lessened but they were still allowed governance of the region. The region also had it's own capital world.
